column5: We are heading to Prairie Bee Lake in a couple of weeks. Does anyone have recent reports from that general area .... how was the fishing, what bait/lures were effective, is the mayfly hatch over, etc?
The fly hatch was last week for Little Missinabie Lake in the same area. Go Blue !
Thanks for the info, Chuck. PS - Isn't "Blue" another word for sad ???? FZ
